rotate_lid_cw.description: Rotate the lid of the pot in clockwise direction.

rotate_lid_ccw.description: Rotate the lid of the pot in counterclockwise direction.

wipe_surroundings.description: Wipe the surface of the lid to clean it off.

push_lid.description: Push the lid down onto the pot.

clean_surroundings.description: Cleanup the lid to remove any external particles or stains.

wipe_lid.description: Wipe down the lid to ensure it's clean.

press_down_lid.description: Press the lid down onto the pot.

clean_lid_surface.description: Wipe the lid to remove any stains or dirt.

rotate_lid.description: Rotate the lid of the pot.

clean_lid.description: Clean the lid of the pot.

clean_inner_pot_body.description: Clean the inside of the pot body.

clean_outer_pot_body.description: Clean the outside of the pot body.

clean_pot_body_surface.description: Wipe down the body of the pot to ensure cleanliness.

wipe_body_clean.description: Wipe down the pot's body to keep it clean.

cleanup_pot_body.description: Ensure the pot's body is clean by wiping it down.

wipe_pot_body.description: Wipe the body of the pot to keep it clean.

clean_body.description: Clean the body of the pot.

cleaning_body.description: Clean the inside of the pot body.

complete_pot_cleaning.description: Clean the whole pot, first the lid then the body.

deep_clean.description: Do a deep cleaning of the pot, rotating the lid for better access.

wipe_lid_then_body.description: Ensure overall cleanliness by first wiping the lid followed by the body.

push_lid_and_cleanup_body.description: Apply pressure on the lid to fix it in place and then cleanup the pot's body.

cleanup_pot_and_twist_lid.description: Ensure complete cleanup of the pot including the body and lid, and then twist the lid.

clean_pot_entirely.description: Ensure the entire pot including its lid and body is cleaned.

clean_lid_and_body.description: First wipe the lid, then the body of the pot to ensure overall cleanliness.

press_lid_and_wipe_body.description: Press the lid down onto the pot and then wipe the body of the pot.

clean_pot_and_rotate_lid.description: Clean the whole pot including both lid and body, and then rotate the lid.

clean_pot.description: Clean the whole pot including both lid and body.

lid_body_action.description: First rotate the lid then clean the body of the KitchenPot.
